description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Sanna Pampel - Researcher for Automotive Human Factors in the University of Nottingham

ABSTRACT
Automation is the replacement of tasks previously conducted by humans with machines or computation. It is anticipated that within a few years it will be possible to replace the human driver by fully automated vehicles. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7764

https://twitter.com/gotocph
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: Automated Driving - Taking the Human Factors Researcher out of the Loop
